page.title: 08TRADE (CONTINUED)
page.content:
AS WELL AS BOARDING CATS, MRS.PICKERING BREEDS GUINEA PIGS. AT THE PRESENT TIME SHE HAS OVER ONE HUNDRED. THE GUINEA PIGS ARE FED ON SUGAR BEET, COOKED BRAN FLAKES AND PLENTY OF FRESH VEGETABLES AS THEY NEED LOTS OF VITAMIN C. MRS. PICKERING'S FAVOURITE BREED IS THE CRESTED GUINEA PIG. MRS. PICKERING ALSO KEEPS HAMSTERS, RABBITS AND SIX DOGS.
{FAT HEN FRUIT FARM. { SITUATED NEAR THE FORD IN ROUNCIL {LANE, KENILWORTH, ON LAND OWNED BY {FERNHILL FARM. AT THE FARM YOU CAN PICK YOUR OWN RASPBERRIES, STRAWBERRIES AND GOOSEBERRIES. THIS YEAR AS IT HAS BEEN A VERY WET SUMMER THE STRAWBERRIES COULD NOT BE PICKED UNTIL JULY AND WERE 42P PER LB.
